started: {emotes.loading} | [Step 1/3] Name the voice channel that you want to create a temporary channel when you join
nextStep: {emotes.loading} | [Step 2/3] Set the standard user limit (1 - 99 -> -1 = infinite)
nextStep2: {emotes.loading} | [Step 3/3] Which bit rate should be set in the temporary channels? (8 - 96 kbps)
done: {emotes.success} | The Join2Create channel has been discontinued
noBitrate: {emotes.error} | Invalid bit rate specified - action canceled
noUserlimit: {emotes.error} | Invalid user limit specified - action canceled
